name: Donald no Magical World
description: When Grimace opens a box labelled "do not open", Donald McDonald and all of his friends get sucked into a magical world with no choice but to find their way out. The player takes on the role of Donald, travelling through different-themed worlds to rescue his friends and find his way back home. Donald wields a magic cane to whack enemies, and can also use an umbrella to glide through the air. Some graphics and music are shared with Treasure's better-known McDonald's Treasure Land Adventure, but the gameplay and level design in this game is completely different.
